Title: ↩️ Russian carriers may be able to use the wet mechanism...

Russian carriers may have the opportunity to use the wet leasing mechanism (implies the ability to lease an aircraft immediately with the crew) together with foreign airlines of friendly countries. Deputy Prime Minister of the Russian Federation Vitaly Savelyev said this in an interview with TASS.
